General.Name: Wenfeng Great World Chain Development Corp
General.Description: Wenfeng Great World Chain Development Corporation operates commercial retail chain in China. The company primarily operates retail businesses, which includes department stores, supermarkets, and electrical appliances stores. It also offers catering services; and engages in sale of wine, tobacco retail, books, newspapers, and audio-visual products, as well as operates value-added telecommunications business. In addition, the company provides domestic trade, industrial investment, photography, housing, and counter rental services, as well as sale of art and crafts. Wenfeng Great World Chain Development Corporation was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.
